code.label: success
code.message_en: Successful Operation

code.label: param_error
code.message_en: Request parameter error
code.tip_zh: 确保请求参数是合法的
code.tip_en: Please check the parameter is valid and query again

code.label: db_name_error
code.message_en: Database does not exist
code.tip_zh: 请使用正确的数据库名
code.tip_en: Use the correct database name

code.label: pack_name_not_found
code.message_en: The querying package does not exist in the databases
code.tip_zh: 请使用正确的包名并重试
code.tip_en: Use the correct package name and try again

code.label: connect_db_error
code.message_en: Failed to Connect the database
code.tip_en: Check the connection

code.label: input_none
code.message_en: The input is None
code.tip_en: Make sure the input value is valid

code.label: file_not_found
code.message_en: File does not exist
code.tip_en: Make sure the file exists

code.label: specified_file_not_exist
code.message_en: The specified file does not exist
code.tip_en: Make sure the specified file exists

code.label: update_or_add_data_failed
code.message_en: Failed to update or add data
code.tip_zh: 请检查命令/数据合法并重试
code.tip_en: Please check the command/data and try again

code.label: table_name_not_exist
code.message_en: There is no such table in the database
code.tip_en: Make sure the table is valid

code.label: update_data_failed
code.message_en: Failed to update data
code.tip_en: Please check and try again

code.label: not_found_database_info
code.message_zh: 无法获取生成的数据库信息
code.message_en: Unable to get the generated database information
code.tip_zh: 确保生成的数据库信息有效
code.tip_en: Make sure the generated database information is valid

code.label: delete_db_error
code.message_en: Failed to delete database
code.tip_en: Please check and try again

code.label: service_error
code.message_en: An exception occurred in the system
code.tip_en: Please check and try again

code.label: configfile_path_empty
code.message_zh: 初始化配置文件不存在
code.message_en: Initialization profile does not exist or cannot be found
code.tip_en: Make sure the initialization profile is valid

code.label: failed_create_database_table
code.message_en: Failed to create database or table
code.tip_zh: 请检查初始化配置文件并重试
code.tip_en: Please check the initialization profile and try again

code.label: type_error
code.message_zh: 初始化文件中的源代码和二进制路径类型异常
code.message_en: The source code and binary path types in the initialization file are abnormal
code.tip_zh: 确保初始化文件中的源代码和二进制路径类型有效
code.tip_en: Make sure the source code and binary path types in the initialization file are valid

code.label: data_merge_error
code.message_en: Multi-file database integration error
code.tip_en: Please check and try again

code.label: file_not_find_error
code.message_zh: 系统初始化配置文件不存在
code.message_en: system initialization configuration file does not exist
code.tip_zh: 确保系统初始化配置文件存在
code.tip_en: Make sure system initialization configuration file exists

code.label: dis_connection_db
code.message_en: Unable to connect to the database
code.tip_zh: 请检查数据库配置并重试
code.tip_en: Please check the database configuration and try again

code.label: filelist_type_error
code.message_zh: 软件包文件类型不在['d'，'f'，'g']中
code.message_en: The package filetype is not in ['d', 'f', 'g']
code.tip_en: Make sure the package filetype is valid

code.label: no_packages_table
code.message_en: There is no packages table in the database
code.tip_en: Make sure the packages table is valid

code.label: database_not_found
code.message_zh: 系统中未查询到此数据库
code.message_en: There is no such database in the system
code.tip_en: Make sure the database is valid

code.label: table_name_not_exist_in_database
code.message_zh: 表名与现有数据库不匹配
code.message_en: Table name dose not match the existed database
code.tip_en: Make sure the table name is valid

code.label: yaml_file_error
code.message_en: Data error in yaml file
code.tip_en: Make sure the yaml file valid

code.label: empty_folder
code.message_en: This is an empty folder
code.tip_en: Make sure the folder is valid

code.label: empty_parsed_data
code.message_en: The parsed yaml data is empty
code.tip_en: Make sure the yaml file is valid

code.label: download_failed
code.message_en: An error occurred and the download failed
code.tip_en: Make sure the file is valid

code.label: get_pkgship_version_failed
code.message_en: get pkgship version failed
code.tip_en: Make sure the file is valid
